text.title: Text
text.description: Text to narrate (max 10,000 characters). Use markers like <#0.5#> to insert pauses in seconds.

pitch.title: Pitch
pitch.description: Semitone offset applied to the voice (−12 to +12).

speed.title: Speed
speed.description: Speech speed multiplier (0.5–2.0). Lower is slower, higher is faster.

volume.title: Volume
volume.description: Relative loudness. 1.0 is default MiniMax gain. Range 0–10.

bitrate.title: bitrate
bitrate.description: MP3 bitrate in bits per second. Only used when audio_format is mp3.

channel.title: channel
channel.description: mono for 1 channel (default), stereo for 2 channels.

emotion.title: emotion
emotion.description: Desired delivery style. Use auto to let MiniMax choose, or pick a specific emotion.

voice_id.title: Voice Id
voice_id.description: Voice to synthesize. Pick any MiniMax system voice or a voice_id returned by https://replicate.com/minimax/voice-cloning.

audio_format.title: audio_format
audio_format.description: File format for the generated audio. Choose mp3 for general use, wav/flac for lossless, or pcm for raw bytes.

language_boost.title: language_boost
language_boost.description: Optional language hint. Choose Automatic to let MiniMax detect the language, or pick a specific locale.

subtitle_enable.title: Subtitle Enable
subtitle_enable.description: Return MiniMax subtitle metadata with sentence timestamps (non-streaming only).

english_normalization.title: English Normalization
english_normalization.description: Improve number/date reading for English text (adds a small amount of latency).
